title: Love Big
description: I am currently building the front end for a website that allows organizations to manage their humanitarian projects and partners. The front end is built using React.js and Material UI components with a custom theme. We are also making use of the Jira board for the project's management.

title: Project: Ron's Food Finder
description: This first project is a Ron Swanson themed website that generates a quote from the character and provides the user with info about a local steak or breakfast restaurant. It makes use of several third party APIs as well as the Materialize CSS framework.

title: Project: Bubbblr
description: This second project is a project management app. It uses Socket.io and Express to allow users to brainstorm for projects in real time, as well as view a pre-organized outline based off of brainstorm 'bubbles' that were sent in chat.

title: Project: The DIY Solution
description: This is a management app that allows users to easily organize the finances for their next DIY project. It's a MERN app that uses Material UI for styling and the Passport API for authentication.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: This is a dashboard that makes use of the OpenWeather API to allow users to get info about the weather in a given area (both daily and 5-day forecast).

title: Day Planner
description: This is an app that allows users to plan out their schedule for a standard 9-5 workday. It uses moment.js to track the current time and color-code each hour based on if it has passed or not.

title: User Directory
description: My first React app uses React components and state along with the RandomUser API to generate a table of user info, which can be sorted by category or filtered by name.
